content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ looking for a quick and delightful crochet project that s perfect for gifts look no further our crochet mitten pattern is here to save the day not only is it versatile and easy to make but it comes in all sizes so that everyone can enjoy cozy hands all season long but wait there s more if you re interested in the full autumn wheat collection click the link below for even more crochet goodness we ve got you covered with our crochet pattern complete with a helpful video tutorial following along has never been easier plus it s available in sizes ranging from baby to adult so no one is left out in the cold join our vibrant community of crochet lovers and embark on an exciting crochet-along journey don t miss out on this opportunity to create stunning pieces for the upcoming chilly months their unique flat construction sets these mittens apart making it perfect for beginners get ready to be cozy and stylish with us today ✨ what size can i make these mittens ✨ ✔️ mittens - 6 sizes baby to adult believe it or not these mittens are crocheted flat this uses a unique construction from the sewing world but we are going to create it from crochet we will work sideways starting with half the thumb then work the body of the mitten then the other half of the thumb the piece will then be folded and seamed to create the final mitten ✨ extra support & tips ✨ ✔️ video tutorials linked on youtube ✔️ join a community of crocheters ✔️ crochet diagram for each section ✨ what you will need to make these crochet mittens ✨ yarn wecrochet upcycle worsted 1 - 33% alpaca 34% wool 33% acrylic 219yds/100g colorway shown sage weight 4 worsted yarn quantities 45 55 65 80 100 140 yds 1 ball for all sizes yarn substitutions listed in pattern notions scissors 2 yarn needle 3 removable stitch marker 4 crochet hook h 5 omm crochet hook 5 ✨ hey i m briana k ✨ join the autumn inspired crochet along for a cozy crochet experience we ll be creating beautiful wearables together in the briana k community collection i ve designed this collection to be fun and easy with only 1-2 seams required you ll love the pretty aesthetic and perfect fit of these approachable pieces make them for yourself or as gifts i ve enjoyed creating items to match my nephew this season get ready to learn new crochet techniques and build a wardrobe full of warmth and style join me and let s crochet together for the entire collection visit https //brianakdesigns etsy com/listing/1606279143 6 -
